name: Northern Lights
description: While the Great Stargazer is deeply sleeping, the Celestial Guardians protect the equilibrium of the forgotten world…
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 – 64 bits Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 – 64 bits Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 660 / Radeon RX 460 or better Storage: 1 GB available space
